DataElement.preferredName: RT Dose Reference Structure Object Type

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Something referred to; the object of a reference._The components and their relationship and manner of arrangement in constituting a whole.

Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
